name: M.I.N.E.
description:
M.I.N.E. – colonization processes control system. Build bases, dig resources, engage in trade, examine artifacts, protect from pirates and attack them in both single- and multiplayer.

http://youtu.be/MGhvRjLCOT0

Features:
- a thousand of stars and procedure-generated planets.
- meteorites, star storms and pirates
- energy control, trading and science
- war drones, missiles, and shields
- terraform and planetary modules
- and much more

Demo version include basic game client, server, tutorial and first mission.Under development:advanced graphic engine.

Full version have advanced game client, and all features from demo version. Under development: more missions, mutators, AI, advanced graphic engine.

Need Xna 4.
